G

getDegree(Vertex) - Method in interface graph.Graph
This function return the degree of given vertex (means number of edged linked to this vertex).
getDegree() - Method in class graph.Vertex
Get the degree (number of edges) of the vertex.
getDestination() - Method in class graph.Edge
Get the destination vertex (or one of the two if it is an undirected edge).
getEdges() - Method in class graph.Vertex
Retrieve all edges which are connected to the vertex.
getInDegree() - Method in class graph.Vertex
Get the in-degree (number of edges which go in) of the vertex.
getName() - Method in class graph.Vertex
Get the name of the vertex.
getNeighbours(Vertex) - Method in interface graph.Graph
This function returns the neighbourgs of the given vertex.
getOutDegree() - Method in class graph.Vertex
Get the out-degree (number of edges which go out) of the vertex.
getSource() - Method in class graph.Edge
Get the source vertex (or one of the two if it is an undirected edge).
